teiHeader.fileDesc:
De virtute et vitio Machine readable text Plutarch Gregorius N. Bernardakis&responsibility;&fund.NEH; &Perseus.publish;
Plutarch Moralia Gregorius N. Bernardakis
Leipzig Teubner 1888
1

div2.p:
ta\ i(ma/tia dokei= qermai/nein to
 a)/nqrwpon, ou)k au)ta\ dh/pou qermai/nonta kai\ prosba/llonta th
 qermo/thta kaq' e(auto\ ga e(/kaston au)tw=n yuxro/n e)stin, h(=| kai\ polla/kis oi( kaumatizo/menoi kai\ pure/ttontes
e)c e(te/rwn e(/tera metalamba/nousin, a)ll' h(
 o( a)/nqrwpos a)nadi/dwsin e)c e(autou= qermo/thta, tau/thn h( e)sqh\s tw=| sw/mati prospesou=sa sune/xei kai\ periste/llei, kai\ kaqeirgnume/nhn ei)s to\ sw=ma ou)k e)a=| pa/lin skeda/nnusqai. tau)to\ dh\ tou=to toi=s pra/gmasin u(pa/rxon e)capata=| tou\s pollou/s, w(s, a)
 oi)ki/as mega/las periba/lwntai kai\ plh=qos a)ndrapo/dwn kai\ xrhma/twn sunaga/gwsin, h(de/ws biwsome/nous. to\ d' h(de/ws zh=n kai\ i(larw=s ou)k e)/cwqe/n e)stin, a)lla\ tou)nanti/on o( a)/nqrwpos toi=s peri\ au(to
 pra/gmasin h(donh
 kai\ xa/rin w(/sper e)k phgh=s tou= h)/qous prosti/qhsin. 15
ai)qome/nou de\ puro\s gerarw/teros oi)=kos i)de/sqai, kai\ plou=tos; h(di/wn kai\ do/ca lamprote/ra kai\ du/namis, a)
 to\ a)po\ th=s yuxh=s e)/xh| gh=qos: o(/pou kai\
peni/an kai\ fugh
 kai\ gh=ras e)lafrw=s kai\ proshnw=s pro\s eu)koli/an kai\ prao/thta tro/pou fe/rousin.

w(s ga\r a)rw/mata tri/bwnas eu)w/deis kai\ r(a/kia poiei=, tou= d' *)agxi/sou to\ sw=ma i)xw=ra ponhro\n e)cedi/dou
nw/tou katasta/zonta bu/ssinon fa/ros,
ou(/tw met' a)reth=s kai\ di/aita pa=sa kai\ bi/os a)/lupo/s e)sti kai\ e)piterph/s:, h( de\ kaki/a kai\ ta\ lampra\ faino/mena kai\ polutelh= kai\ semna\ mignume/nh luphra\ kai\ nautiw/dh kai\ duspro/sdekta pare/xei toi=s kekthme/nois
ou(=tos maka/rios e)n a)gora=| nomi/zetai:
e)pa\n d' a)noi/ch| ta\s: qu/ras, trisa/qlios,
gunh\ kratei= pa/ntwn, e)pita/ttei, ma/xet' a)ei/. kai/toi gunaiko\s ou) xalepw=s a)/n tis a)pallagei/h ponhra=s a)nh\r w)/n, mh\ a)ndra/podon pro\s de\ th\n e(autou= kaki/an ou)k e)/sti graya/menon a)po/leiyin pragma/twn a)fei=sqai kai\ a)napau/esqai geno/menon kaq' au(to/n, a)ll' a)ei\ sunoikou=sa toi=s spla/gxnois kai\ prospefukui=a nu/ktwr kai\ meq' h(me/ran
eu)/ei a)/ter dalou= kai\ w)mw=| gh/rai+ dw=ke,
barei=a sune/kdhmos ou)=sa di' a)lazonei/an kai\ polutelh\s su/ndeipnos u(po\ lixnei/as kai\ su/gkoitos o)dunhra/, fronti/si kai\ meri/mnais kai\ zhlotupi/ais e)kko/ptousa to\n u(/pnon kai\ diafqei/rousa. kai\ ga\r o(\ kaqeu/dousi, tou= sw/matos u(/pnos e)sti\ kai\ a)na/pausis, th=s yuxh=s ptoi=ai kai\ o)/neiroi kai\ taraxai\ dia\ deisidaimoni/an.
o(/tan de\ nusta/zonta\ m' h( lu/ph la/bh|,
a)po/llum' u(po\ tw=n e)nupni/wn
fhsi/ tis. ou(/tw de\ kai\ fqo/nos 1 kai\ fo/bos kai\ qumo\s; kai\ a)kolasi/a diati/qhsi. meq' h(me/ran me\n ga\r e)/cw ble/pousa kai\ susxhmatizome/nh pro\s e(te/rous h( kaki/a duswpei=tai kai\ parakalu/ptei ta\ pa/qh, kai\ panta/pasi tai=s o(rmai=s; e)kdi/dwsin e(auth\n a)ll' a)ntitei/nei kai\ ma/xetai polla/kis: e)n de\ toi=s u(/pnois a)pofugou=sa do/cas kai\ no/mous kai\ porrwta/tw genome/nh tou= dedie/nai
te kai\ ai)dei=sqai, pa=san e)piqumi/an kinei= kai\ e)panegei/rei to\ kako/hqes kai\ a)ko/laston. mhtri/ te ga\r e)pixeirei= mi/gnusqai 1:, w(/s fhsin o( *pla/twn; kai\ brw/seis a)qe/smous prosfe/retai kai\ pra/cews ou)demia=s a)pe/xetai, a)polau/ousa tou= paranomei=n w(s a)nusto\n
e)stin ei)dw/lois kai\ fa/smasin ei)s ou)demi/an h(donh\n ou)de\ telei/wsin tou= e)piqumou=ntos teleutw=sin, a)lla\ kinei=n mo/non kai\ diagriai/nein ta\ pa/qh kai\ ta\ nosh/mata duname/nois.

pou= toi/nun to\ h(du\ th=s kaki/as e)sti/n, ei) mhdamou=
to\ a)me/rimnon kai\ to\ a)/lupon mhd' au)ta/rkeia mhd' a)taraci/a mhd' h(suxi/a; tai=s me
 ga th=s sarko\s h(donai=s; h( tou= sw/matos eu)krasi/a kai\ u(gi/eia xw/ran kai\ ge/nesin di/dwsi: th=| de\ yuxh=| ou)k e)/stin e)ggene/sqai gh=qos ou)de\ xara
 be/baion, a)
 mh\ to\ eu)/qumon kai\ a)/fobon kai\ qarrale/on w(/sper e(/dran h)\ galh/nhn a)/kluston u(poba/lhtai, a)lla\ ka)
 u(pomeidia/sh| tis
e)lpi\s h)\ te/ryis, au(/th taxu\ fronti/dos e)kragei/shs w(/sper e)n eu)di/a| spila/dos sunexu/qh kai\ sunetara/xqh.

*(/aqroize xrusi/on, su/nage a)rgu/rion, oi)kodo/mei peripa/tous, e)/mplhson a)ndrapo/dwn th
 oi)ki/an kai\ xrewstw=n th
 po/lin: a)
 mh\ ta\ pa/qh th=s yuxh=s katastore/sh|s kai\ th
 a)plhsti/an pau/sh|s kai\ fo/bwn kai\ fronti/dwn a)palla/ch|s sauto/n, oi)=non dihqei=s: pure/ttonti kai\ xolikw=| me/li prosfe/reis kai\ siti/a kai\ o)/ya koiliakoi=s e(toima/zeis kai\ dusenterikoi=s, mh\ ste/gousi mhde\ r(wnnume/nois a)lla\ prosdiafqeirome/nois u(p' au)tw=n. ou)x o(ra=|s tou\s nosou=ntas o(/ti tw=n brwma/twn ta\ kaqarw/tata kai\ polutele/stata dusxerai/nousi kai\ diaptu/ousi kai\ paraitou=ntai prosfero/ntwn kai\ biazome/nwn, ei)=ta, th=s kra/sews metabalou/shs kai\ pneu/matos xrhstou= kai\ gluke/os ai(/matos e)ggenome/nou kai\ qermo/thtos; oi)kei/as, a)nasta/ntes a)/rton lito
 e)pi\ turw=| kai\ karda/mw| xai/rousi kai\ a)smeni/zousin e)sqi/ontes; toiau/thn o( lo/gos e)mpoiei= th=| yuxh=| dia/qesin. au)ta/rkhs e)/sh|, a)
 ma/qh|s ti/ to\ kalo
 ka)gaqo/n e)sti: trufh/seis e)n peni/a| kai\ basileu/seis kai\ to
 a)pra/gmona bi/on kai\ i)diw/thn ou)de
 h(=tton a)gaph/seis h)\ to
 e)pi\ strathgi/ais kai\ h(gemoni/ais: ou) biw/sh| filosofh/sas a)hdw=s, a)lla\ pantaxou= zh=n h(de/ws maqh/sh| kai\ a)po\ pa/ntwn: eu)franei= se
plou	os pollou\s eu)ergetou=nta kai\ peni/a polla\ mh\ merimnw=nta kai\ do/ca timw/menon kai\ a)doci/a mh\ fqonou/menon.
